This function calculates N(6, 3, p).

Parameters: #simulations = 10000.
p from 0.07 to 0.15 step 0.005.

p, N(p), SD, #percolation, size.

0.07, 407.837, 304.225, 5868, 130
0.075, 494.847, 185.879, 8802, 130
0.08, 437.242, 91.4196, 9915, 130
0.085, 342.689, 60.3928, 9999, 130
0.09, 272.989, 43.3068, 10000, 130
0.095, 223.061, 33.3929, 10000, 130
0.1, 185.421, 26.1444, 10000, 130
0.105, 157.875, 21.2792, 10000, 130
0.11, 136.639, 17.6638, 10000, 130
0.115, 120.059, 15.266, 10000, 130
0.12, 106.645, 13.4098, 10000, 130
0.125, 95.7378, 11.89, 10000, 130

0.135, 79.1448, 9.61484, 10000, 130
0.14, 72.8512, 9.05258, 10000, 130
0.145, 67.2386, 8.33129, 10000, 130
